channel.title: chemistry on Arun Gopinath
channel.description: Recent content in chemistry on Arun Gopinath

item.title: Visualising Election Ink in 3D
item.description: Election day thought I was at the polling station to take part in covid19 election era. As usual, the violet ink marked my participation in the mega event. This ink is a super solution capable of changing the lives of the people. After reaching home, all I want to know is " what is this solution? “. The answer is Silver nitrate. According to Wikipedia, the exact composition consists of alcohol and biocides for longevity and to ensure bacteria not transferred from voter to voter.
